attributes.action:
Mandatory sentences for carrying knifes.
No warnings! No fines!
attributes.additional_details:
For too long the citizens of England have had to endure the lack of action taken by the government. Criminals that do not think twice before stabbing our children, our fathers, our mothers and our friends.

The criminals have no fear as the justice system has failed to make a statement of harsh punishments. 

When it is your son or daughter that is killed for thier phone then maybe you will agree with this statement.

 I want my daughter to grow up in a safe London and I want the same for all.
attributes.background: Increase all sentences for knife crime. Take away warnings, community service, fines and only use imprisonment as a punishment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Mandatory 10-year sentence for possession of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636853
